titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that Robert Mueller should resign from his special counsel position.
Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that Robert Mueller should resign from his special counsel position.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

term.name: Government ethics and transparency, public corruption

bill.summary: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that Robert Mueller is compromised and should resign from his special counsel position.
